expiring.title: Expiring Patrons
expiring.details: Patrons that have library cards about to expire will need to be notified. Use this section to manage expiring patron contact details and to send out email notifications.

notified.title: Notified Patrons
notified.details: This section provides a list of previously notified patrons.

templates.title: Email Templates
templates.details: Different patron types may required different templates. Manage Templates here.

settings.title: Settings
settings.details: Use this section to manage general application settings.
